name: 1plusX
description: 1plusX is a provider of advertising technology that enables large media companies to understand their online users better to improve their product offering and their advertising. We are using latest advances in machine learning to power our technology platform. As a Switzerland-based company, we comply with strict Swiss and European data privacy regulations.

name: 33Across
description: 33Across is the first and only publisher traffic and monetization platform to guarantee quality through ads that are 100 percent in-view and viewed by humans. Through our advanced technology, and insight into how people view, consume and share content across devices, we enable more than one million publishers to increase revenue and traffic. The 33Across traffic building, insights and monetization tools allow publishers to do what they do best to create great content.

name: 4W MARKETPLACE SRL

name: Accordant Media
description: Accordant Media is a programmatic media and technology company that helps marketers deploy data-driven marketing strategies across addressable media channels.

name: Acxiom/LiveRamp
description: Acxiom is an enterprise data, analytics and software as a service company. For more than 40 years, Acxiom has been a leader in harnessing the powerful potential of data to strengthen connections between people, businesses and their partners.

name: ADARA
description: ADARA leverages global proprietary travel data to deliver increased business performance through their innovative platform, and exceptional team. ADARA`s Magellan platform transforms loyalty, search and booking data into actionable insight allowing companies to better understand, reach and engage customers. Magellan is fueled by first-party data from over 100 global travel brands, including United, Delta, Hyatt, Marriott and Hertz. Founded in 2009, ADARA currently has 19 offices across the US, Europe, Middle East and Asia, including its headquarters in Palo Alto, California.

name: Adbrain
description: People are consuming media across more devices than ever before, which makes delivering a consistent brand experience increasingly difficult. Thatâ��s where Adbrain comes in. Adbrain empowers you to solve for this fragmentation by unifying varied quality data sources so that you can focus on targeting the person, not just their device.

name: Addition+
description: Addition+ is the world first cross-channel programmatic media planning and buying agency. We help companies put programmatic technologies and techniques at the heart of their marketing strategy. Addition+ is committed to customer privacy and data protection .

name: AddThis

Adform Rich Media offers a wide selection of solutions from simple expanding banners to the latest interactive and HD video advertisement formats. name: Gumgum
description:
GumGum is a leading computer vision company with a mission to unlock the value of every online image for marketers. Its patented image-recognition technology delivers highly visible advertising campaigns to more than 400 million users as they view pictures and content across more than 2,000 premium publishers.

Founded in 2007, GumGum invented the in-image advertising category and is used by the majority of Fortune 100 companies. GumGum ads consistently achieve an 81% viewability rate and deliver 10 times better engagement than traditional display options, while still prioritizing high-quality inventory, brand safety, and user experience. The company also offers GumGum Visual Intelligence, a real-time visual listening platform that helps brands identify and activate online pictures relevant to them, as well as engage their top influencers on social media.

Myntelligence does not know and has no need to know consumers personally to provide them with relevant advertising, since it does not request or store personal information that can be used to identify consumers individually, such as name, address, phone number or email address.

name: Outbrain

name: Platform161
description:
Platform161 is the world`s only truly customizable digital marketing platform that really enables advertisers to adapt to the fast changing market of digital marketing. In an ecosystem that is both competitive and complex, the ability to adapt and customize is crucial. We believe that one size does not fit all in the digital advertising landscape. Operating only on the demand side, we are completely independent from any supplier. Our transparent approach helps maximize value for our clients without any hidden costs.
We transcend the limitations of the standardized products that are so dominant in our ecosystem. Our team`s extensive knowledge in the field of digital marketing is key to help our clients to maximize return on investment. name: Semasio GmbH
description: Semasio GmbH www.semasio.com  Conventional methods of creating Interest Targets only consider a binary membership of users: either the user is in target or not. This is determined by the frequency and recency with which the user has visited pages categorized as being about the specific topic. Therefore, it does not capture the dynamics and complexity of true human interests.  A Semasio user profile is a large, weighted keyword cloud of the most important terms and phrases in the internet pages consumed by each user. When a new Interest Target is built, a large, weighted keyword cloud is also created for the desired target. This happens by feeding the Semasio Targeting Technology with good examples of sites, channels and pages that reflect the desired interest. The system then extracts a weighted keyword from the cloud based on specific examples. This is the semantic core of the desired Interest Target.

name: ShareThis

name: Smart AdServer
description:
Founded in 2001, Smart AdServer develops and markets premium ad serving solutions for media agencies and publishers to manage display campaigns for Web, mobile and iPad/tablets. Smart AdServer has 10 offices worldwide and is a subsidiary of the Axel Springer group.

Smart AdServer is a remote ad serving system enabling sites and advertisers to manage the delivery of their online advertising campaigns. 
Only anonymous statistical data on their visitors to follow the delivery of their campaign and to increase their performance can be collected: all online measurements are compiled and anonymous. They essentially relate to Internet advertising campaign exposure. In addition to that, Smart AdServer may use cookies to provide advanced statistical data.

description: Taboola is the world`s leading content discovery platform, reaching 750 million unique visitors and serving over 300 billion recommendations every month. Publishers, marketers, and agencies leverage Taboola to retain users on their site, monetize their traffic, and distribute their content to drive high-quality audiences to their ultimate destinations. Taboola does this by providing website publishers with its content recommendation widget that appears on their websites and recommends additional links to related articles, videos, and slideshows, both from within the site and from other content providersand advertisers. Taboola uses its proprietary EngageRank mathematical algorithm to recommend content that web visitors are most likely to click on, providing leading publishers with a single, ultimate discovery and monetization solution. These recommendations appear in high-impact placements alongside editorial content on top sites around the web, driving monetization and engagement goals for publishers, and creating a new way for brands to reach consumers through in-depth storytelling.  Publishers using Taboola include, MailOnline, The Independent, Dennis, Eurosport, Sport1, Welt, L\'Express, RT, Marie Claire, and many more.

name: Ve Global
description: Ve Global does not collect any personally identifying information about the internet user for the purposes of Internet advertising. Ve Global does use cookies for the purpose of serving retargeted adverts to users. No identifiable information is stored. And you can opt out of tracking at any time on this page. Ve Global is registered with the UK Information Commission and is compliant with the EEC Privacy Directive. Ve Global is a signatory to the IAB Europe OBA Framework. In line with every other internet business, Ve Global will analyse web server activity logs. These servers log the number of times different creative executions are served. None of this recorded data is personally identifiable to any user. Ve Global clients and media owner partners have access to a Ve Global campaign management system via a unique username and password to access reporting information that relates to their own campaigns. The only personal client data our databases record is our clients contact details including contact name, company address, email address and phone number.

name: Xaxis
description: Xaxis is a business which operates globally as part of the GroupM media investment group. Xaxis does not provide its advertising-related services (“Services”) directly to consumers. Instead, our clients are corporate businesses, including advertisers and agencies. Our clients use our Services, on their own behalf and/or on behalf of their own clients, to help them understand the advertising that the clients deliver online (e.g. what sites it was delivered on, who saw it and whether or not anyone interacted with it) and to improve the effectiveness of that advertising and we also help them to try to deliver advertising to consumers who are more likely to be interested in their products and services. For example, if we think that a user is interested in mobile phone options, then our Services may help our clients deliver interest-based online advertisements to that user about a particular type of mobile phone product or service. When you view and interact with web sites, applications, and other digital properties (“Sites”) and with advertisements where our Services are utilized, our Services are designed to collect and/or use information about the type of web pages that individuals visit and about interactions that they have with Sites and with our clients’ advertisements. We also collect information that identifies the browsers and devices of the individuals who have viewed our clients’ advertising. This may include information such as the type of Internet browser used by an online user, the type of computer operating system used, the domain name of the websites visited before and after viewing an advertisement, as well as information related to websites and web pages a user is viewing when an advertisement is shown.
company_privacy_link_text: To learn more about how we collect and use information for online advertising, please visit

name: Ziff Davis
description: Ziff Davis, LLC (www.ziffdavis.com) is a digital media company specializing in the tech, gaming and men\'s lifestyle markets. Ziff Davis sites include PCMag.com, ExtremeTech, IGN, TechBargains and Askmen. We use cookies, Javascript, pixel tags and other technology to collect information about your visit to our sites and other third party partner websites that we do not own or operate but with whom we have agreements. We analyze what pages you visit on our sites and the third party sites, what products or services you view, and whether you view or click on ads that are shown to you. All such data is collected anonymously, and is aggregated with other data we collect and/or similar data collected by partners to create segments, groups of users and certain general interest categories or segments that we have inferred. We use this information to get a more accurate picture of audience interests in order to serve ads we believe are more relevant to your interests.
